function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious disease spread due to lockdown-related limitations on economic activities and livelihoods","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and community spread, leading to higher infection rates and overwhelmed healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implementing strict public health measures, providing economic support to affected individuals, ensuring access to healthcare services","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, remote healthcare services, telemedicine","People":"Population in areas with limited economic activity and livelihood opportunities","Owner":"Government authorities, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Health inequalities due to existing social stratification and resource sharing","Impact":"Limited access to essential healthcare services for lower socio-economic strata, leading to higher vulnerability to disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Investing in public health infrastructure, increasing healthcare resources in disadvantaged communities, addressing social and economic disparities","Technologies":"Telehealth services, mobile clinics, health data analytics","People":"Lower socio-economic strata, disadvantaged communities","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Increase in domestic violence cases and mental health issues due to social isolation and lockdowns","Impact":"Compromised mental health, increased risk of abuse and violence, reduced access to support services","Mitigation":"Enhancing mental health support, providing resources for victims of domestic violence, promoting community outreach and support","Technologies":"Virtual counseling services, online support groups, mental health apps","People":"Women, children, individuals facing domestic violence, those experiencing social isolation","Owner":"Social service organizations, mental health professionals"}]}
